CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- 건물 체력 관련 모델인 BuildingHpBarForeground 모델에서 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- 현재 건물 체력을 체력바 형태로 표시

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local MaxHp = 0 local Hp = 0 local Building = self.Entity.Parent.Parent
wait(0.1) if Building.TagComponent.Tags:Contains("building") then MaxHp = Building.Building.BuildingInfo["MaxHp"] Hp = Building.Building.Hp elseif Building.TagComponent.Tags:Contains("monsterbuilding") then MaxHp = Building.MonsterBuilding.MaxHp Hp = Building.MonsterBuilding.Hp end
self:SetHpBarSize(MaxHp, Hp)
